title: Photo–thermo-catalytic hydrogen production by an interfacial reactor with potassium-doped polymeric carbon nitride/titanium nitride
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,3092-3103
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00313F, Paper
Dechao Wang, Hang Zhao, Jianglin Tu, Xun Zhu, Dingding Ye, Yang Yang, Hong Wang, Rong Chen, Qiang Liao
An interfacial reactor with PPCN/TiN is developed for photo–thermo-catalytic hydrogen production.
